column3: The evolution of social media into a robust mechanism for social transformation is already visible. Despite many adamant critics who insist that tools like Facebook, Twitter, and YouTube are little more than faddish distractions useful only to exchange trivial information, these critics are being proven wrong time and again.

It just made me fall in love with punk again and remember my roots, and since that time I've always wanted to do more of that kind of music again.
